How to use this website

In our side bar, you can see six icons: Home, How To, Tests, Profile, Progress and Game Graphs.

In Home, you can get to know a little more about our project, our research, our references and even about us. Don't forget to scroll to the bottom!

The Tests page directs you to where our games take place. This is also where you'll have to make your account the first time you play, or login when you return to fill in our questions about your mood, sleep routine, and other data that will help us generate amazing visualizations for you!

In Profile, you will need to login again, so you can see your visualizations. We have plans to make this part more integrated with the rest of the webpage in the future, but for now, don't forget it!

In Progress and Game Graphs, you can see the payoff for the data we've collected! If nothing appears for you, it might be because you forgot to login in the Profile section, or didn't play any games yet.
